projects.title: DevSaathi
projects.subtitle: Developer Networking Platform
desc: Built a full-stack social platform with real-time chat, connections, and premium plans.
Implemented Socket.IO for real-time messaging with room-based chat functionality.
Integrated Razorpay payment gateway with webhook handling for order management.

projects.title: NotesGen AI
projects.subtitle: Smart YouTube Notes Generator
desc: AI-powered app to generate structured notes from YouTube videos.
Used Supabase for auth and YouTube transcript extraction.
Managed state with Zustand and built responsive UI with Tailwind + ShadCN.

projects.title: SwadSeva
projects.subtitle: Online Food Delivery Web App
desc: Implemented dynamic search and sorting for restaurants by name, ratings, or distance.
Optimized performance using custom hooks and useCallback to avoid re-renders.
Added shimmer UI and floating cart animation for a smoother, interactive experience.

projects.title: What2Watch AI
projects.subtitle: Movie Recommendation Platform
desc: Integrated Gemini AI's API for movie recommendations based on user queries.
Optimized performance with custom hooks and useCallback to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
Utilized Redux Toolkit for state management and memoization to optimize performance.

projects.title: VTube
projects.subtitle: Dynamic Video Discovery Platform
desc: Integrated YouTube's live API for real-time data updates.
Implemented video search with Google's AutoComplete API, optimized with caching and debouncing to minimize API calls.
Created a dynamic watch video page that displays video information, including likes, views,comments.

projects.title: Travel Advisor
projects.subtitle: Location Based Web App
desc: Built a ReactJS app using the Travel-Advisor API for nearby places.
Utilized Axios for data retrieval and React-Google-Maps API for interactive map display.
Styled the app with Sass and deployed it on Firebase for online accessibility.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.subtitle: Personal Portfolio Website
desc: A personal portfolio website built using Next.js and TypeScript
Showcases frontend skills
Deployed on firebase hosting
Used Tailwind CSS for styling
